name: Circuitron
description: Circuitron is a vintage oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box and buttons, soldier-like arms and legs, and a screen that displays data in the traditional oscilloscope style, Circuitron is a unique fusion of retro and modern technology. Its specialized helmet addon provides enhanced protection and functionality. This robot stands out with its nostalgic design and advanced capabilities, making it a valuable asset to the WebtrES club.
